author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Imax ‍Signs 30 Theatre Agreement With Guangzhou Jinyi Media Corp In China​
text:
April 3 (Reuters) - Imax Corp - ‍Signs 30 :
* THEATRE AGREEMENT WITH GUANGZHOU JINYI MEDIA CORPORATION IN CHINA​
* ‍THEATRES ARE EXPECTED TO OPEN BEGINNING THIS YEAR THROUGH 2023 WITH APPROXIMATELY HALF TO BE INSTALLED BY 2019​
* ‍AGREEMENT BRINGS TO 885, IMAX’S TOTAL NUMBER OF CONTRACTED THEATRES IN GREATER CHINA WITH 543 OPEN AND 342 CONTRACTED TO OPEN​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
